scripts.proposal:all: npm run proposal:docx && npm run proposal:pdf
scripts.setup:proposals: pip3 install --user --break-system-packages -r requirements-proposals.txt && npm --prefix mcp-server install && npm install
scripts.proposal:test: python3 ingested_data/meta/proposal_builder.py --format md --out proposals/_sanity.md && test -s proposals/_sanity.md && echo '✅ Proposal system working'
scripts.proposal:docx:audit: python3 ingested_data/meta/proposal_builder.py --format docx --out proposals/_audit.docx | python3 -m json.tool
scripts.mcp:smoke: echo '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"method":"tools/list"}' | node mcp-server/dist/server.js | grep -q generate_proposal && echo '✅ MCP server working'
scripts.mcp:ping: echo '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"ping","arguments":{}}}' | node mcp-server/dist/server.js 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'ok' && echo '✅ MCP server healthy'
